page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE AT LEE-ON-SOLENT
page.content: I am Timothy.I live in Southcliff Road.I am eight years old.I live with my Mum,my Dad and my Brother.My Dad is forty years old,my Mum is thirty-nine and my Brother is six.Our house is detached.Inside our house we live in the warmth of gas radiators and we also have electricity. Our house is made of brick and cement and inside it is decorated with wallpaper and paint.We have two toilets,one living-room,one dining-room,a kitchen and a utility room and also a garage. Upstairs we have two bedrooms that we use and two rooms that we use for spare rooms for when people come to stay with us. We have a front and a back garden.We play games in the garden.We have two cars.The roof of our house is made of slate that has been carefully cut and shaped.
